cause.description:
We are here to stop the purposeful and un warented assult on video games in the right wing media and news outlets. We are going to speack out against the politicians in Canada and the USA that are trying so hard to stop a true and unique art form.
1. To stop the censorship of the art.
2. To raise awarense on the fact that video games do not create violent people.
3. Help in the fight for the right to play.
cause.mission: Raise awarense and fight back against the people that try to censor us.
cause.name: Video games as an art form.
